description:
When I shot these pics, they were for an upcoming single, a post breakup song. But now I look at this photo and I’m connecting it to the anger and rage I feel around George Floyd murder and other injustices that continue to occur without care or consequence. I don’t have the answers. It’s seems we can’t win whether silent or violent. I’m a black LGBT man, a living one, an artist and I will channel my anger and rage into my creativity. It may disturb some but now is not the time to be comfortable. 
Sincerely,
The Captain 👨🏿‍✈️
